thread.section_title: TENAQUIP Limited Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TENAQUIP Limited | www.tenaquip.com
thread.title: Al S.
thread.title_full: TENAQUIP Limited reviewed by Al S.

author: Al S.
title: Al S.
text: There is very little over the years that Tenaquip has not been able to help us with. I have always thought of Tenaquip as a solutions supplier as opposed to a parts or commodity supplier. Unless I'm buying something which is just a buy like a set of rolling stairs where I know exactly what I want Tenaquip and their team have always made sure they understand what our needs are and have always provided viable solutions to a particular issue. In situations where we simply don't know what is available for a particular issue Tenaquip has always come through with a workable solution. I have no reservations in dealing with Tenaquip.
